snippet.title: Ariokan Video Pitch v1
snippet.description:
Ariokan: the Collectible Card Game where players can create their own cards.

In Ariokan, when building their decks, players can choose cards among:

- the available ones including the ones they created themselves,
- several Factions, each one featuring unique effects, keywords and
- powerful special cards named "Hunters" and "Gods" that can turn the tide at any time.

Because of these reasons Ariokan offers endless possibilities of deck building, and every game feels different than the other ones.
